result.eng: The politicians must cut down on their expenses.
result.ga: Caithfidh na polaiteoirí gearradh siar ar a gcuid costas
result.orig: Caithfidh na polaiteoirí gearradh siar ar a gcuid costas
result.html: Caithfidh na polaiteoirí gearradh siar ar a gcuid costasThe politicians must cut down on their expenses.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ na polaiteoirí gearraḋ siar ar a gcuid costasThe politicians must cut down on their expenses.

result.eng: You'd think from their talk that they had sex every night.
result.ga: Cheapfá óna gcuid cainte go raibh siad ag bualadh craicinn gach oíche
result.orig: Cheapfá óna gcuid cainte go raibh siad ag bualadh craicinn gach oíche
result.html: Cheapfá óna gcuid cainte go raibh siad ag bualadh craicinn gach oícheYou'd think from their talk that they had sex every night.
result.ponchtml: Ċeapfá óna gcuid cainte go raiḃ siad ag bualaḋ craicinn gaċ oíċeYou'd think from their talk that they had sex every night.

result.eng: All they want is to take revenge on their old enemies.
result.ga: Níl uathu ach díoltas a bhaint amach ar a gcuid sean-naimhde
result.orig: Níl uathu ach díoltas a bhaint amach ar a gcuid sean-naimhde
result.html: Níl uathu ach díoltas a bhaint amach ar a gcuid sean-naimhdeAll they want is to take revenge on their old enemies.
result.ponchtml: Níl uaṫu aċ díoltas a ḃaint amaċ ar a gcuid sean-naiṁdeAll they want is to take revenge on their old enemies.

result.eng: Spread the news through your social networks.
result.ga: Scaipigí an scéal trí bhur gcuid líonraí sóisialta
result.orig: Scaipigí an scéal trí bhur gcuid líonraí sóisialta
result.html: Scaipigí an scéal trí bhur gcuid líonraí sóisialtaSpread the news through your social networks.
result.ponchtml: Scaipigí an scéal trí ḃur gcuid líonraí sóisialtaSpread the news through your social networks.

result.eng: What hours do you attend your classes?
result.ga: Cé na huaireanta a mbíonn sibh ag freastal ar bhur gcuid cúrsaí
result.orig: Cé na huaireanta a mbíonn sibh ag freastal ar bhur gcuid cúrsaí
result.html: Cé na huaireanta a mbíonn sibh ag freastal ar bhur gcuid cúrsaíWhat hours do you attend your classes?
result.ponchtml: Cé na huaireanta a mbíonn siḃ ag freastal ar ḃur gcuid cúrsaíWhat hours do you attend your classes?

result.eng: Where do you [usually] play your music?
result.ga: Cén áit a mbíonn sibh ag casadh bhur gcuid ceoil
result.orig: Cén áit a mbíonn sibh ag casadh bhur gcuid ceoil
result.html: Cén áit a mbíonn sibh ag casadh bhur gcuid ceoilWhere do you [usually] play your music?
result.ponchtml: Cén áit a mbíonn siḃ ag casaḋ ḃur gcuid ceoilWhere do you [usually] play your music?

result.eng: And what about the rest of the weekend?
result.ga: Agus céard faoin gcuid eile den deireadh seachtaine
result.orig: Agus céard faoin gcuid eile den deireadh seachtaine
result.html: Agus céard faoin gcuid eile den deireadh seachtaineAnd what about the rest of the weekend?
result.ponchtml: Agus céard faoin gcuid eile den deireaḋ seaċtaineAnd what about the rest of the weekend?

result.eng: They had a chance to showcase their storytelling talents to the public.
result.ga: Bhí deis acu a gcuid buanna scéalaíochta a chur os comhair an phobail
result.orig: Bhí deis acu a gcuid buanna scéalaíochta a chur os comhair an phobail
result.html: Bhí deis acu a gcuid buanna scéalaíochta a chur os comhair an phobailThey had a chance to showcase their storytelling talents to the public.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí deis acu a gcuid buanna scéalaíoċta a ċur os coṁair an ṗobailThey had a chance to showcase their storytelling talents to the public.

result.eng: They left their clothes behind and off they went into the cold water.
result.ga: D'fhág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaidh agus isteach leo san uisce fuar
result.orig: D'fhág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaidh agus isteach leo san uisce fuar
result.html: D'fhág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaidh agus isteach leo san uisce fuarThey left their clothes behind and off they went into the cold water.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaiḋ agus isteaċ leo san uisce fuarThey left their clothes behind and off they went into the cold water.

result.eng: He had dogs with him. All I remember is their teeth snarling at us.
result.ga: Bhí madraí leis Ní cuimhin liom ach a gcuid fiacla ag drannadh orainn
result.orig: Bhí madraí leis Ní cuimhin liom ach a gcuid fiacla ag drannadh orainn
result.html: Bhí madraí leis Ní cuimhin liom ach a gcuid fiacla ag drannadh orainnHe had dogs with him. All I remember is their teeth snarling at us.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí madraí leis Ní cuiṁin liom aċ a gcuid fiacla ag drannaḋ orainnHe had dogs with him. All I remember is their teeth snarling at us.

result.eng: The images startled me with their strange beauty.
result.ga: Bhain na híomhánna bíogadh asam lena gcuid áilleachta aduaine
result.orig: Bhain na híomhánna bíogadh asam lena gcuid áilleachta aduaine
result.html: Bhain na híomhánna bíogadh asam lena gcuid áilleachta aduaineThe images startled me with their strange beauty.
result.ponchtml: Ḃain na híoṁánna bíogaḋ asam lena gcuid áilleaċta aduaineThe images startled me with their strange beauty.

result.eng: Readers and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.
result.ga: Níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiú
result.orig: Níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiú
result.html: Níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiúReaders and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.
result.ponchtml: Níor ġá gur ṫoṁaltóirí nuaċta iad an luċt léiṫeoireaċta nó éisteaċta a ṫuilleaḋ aċ táirgeoirí a ḃeaḋ in inṁe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a ḃailiúReaders and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.

result.eng: Some writers got very little feedback on their blogs.
result.ga: Is beag aischothú a fuair scríbhneoirí áirithe ar a gcuid blaganna
result.orig: Is beag aischothú a fuair scríbhneoirí áirithe ar a gcuid blaganna
result.html: Is beag aischothú a fuair scríbhneoirí áirithe ar a gcuid blagannaSome writers got very little feedback on their blogs.
result.ponchtml: Is beag aisċoṫú a fuair scríḃneoirí áiriṫe ar a gcuid blagannaSome writers got very little feedback on their blogs.
